name: Quantum Big Lotto
bg_desc: After the astounding success of the Interastral Big Lotto, the Business Consolidation Department struck while the iron was hot and issued the classic Quantum Big Lotto, riding on the hype of the big lotto's extrapolations and predictions. To solve this eternal question in probability and to obtain information about fortune in pure randomness, the number of students enrolling in the Quantum History School had once exceeded the peak level before their reformation.
